channel.title: Hello Moparscape, :D
channel.description: Hello Moparscape, my name is James, and I would like to propose an introduction. I have found RSPS, very fun since 2008. I have been browsing these forums since 2009, but have now decided to sign up. It is a great pleasure to meet all of you. Feel free to leave any comments below. :D

item.title: Hello Moparscape, :D
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:34, topic:405188”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=502184.msg3673928#msg3673928 date=1311122613]

how are you

spamspamspamspam

You are correct when you said you aren’t Mark Twain. Double negatives and incorrect usage of comma. Tsk tsk. Note how important the correct usage of a comma can be:

I helped my Uncle Jack, off his horse.

I helped my uncle, jack off his horse.

I am glad that a user that shows signs of intelligence (unlike the kids in the help section… :fp:) has joined the ranks of us. Hopefully you will enjoy your stay and meet some friends, and maybe every once in a while do something productive for the community.
[/quote]Too bad it’s just supposed to be “I helped my uncle jack off his horse”, there’s no commas in it at all =/[/quote]
I actually thought about that, but then I wouldn’t be able to use that example. He used a comma, just not in the right spot.

JamesHess:

Btw, would the community like Anti-Virus programs? And a Uninstaller to keep getting max versions for free? Just thought I would ask before I got trolled. There is more than just that in the package.

Yeah no wares. You can post topics about your socks though.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Moparscape, :D
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

That kind of stuff we don’t like.

We only like the following: QQ topics, Topics asking for advice, Topics asking about having sex, Topics about health, Topics about killing people, etc

We don’t want the following: Anything useful.

Read full topic
